it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller

Class TimedExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.TimedExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimerListener

    public class TimedExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerListener
    Object that executes a given runnable object within a certain period of time. The timer will determine the time after which the execution will be interrupted.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimedExecutor(java.lang.Runnable r)
      Initializes the TimedExecutor object with the runnable that needs to be executed.
      TimedExecutor(java.lang.Runnable r, TimerListener listener)
      Initializes the TimedExecutor object with the runnable that needs to be executed and a TimerListener object that listens to the Timer keeping the time for the execution.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void abort()
      Aborts the execution, requesting an interrupt on the execution thread.
      static void abortExecution()
      Aborts the execution of the current thread and throws an InterruptExecutionException.
      void execute(int seconds)
      Executes the runnable passed to the constructor.
      static void pauseTimer()
      Pauses the timer of the TimedExecutor associated to the current thread.
      static void resumeTimer()
      Resumes the timer of the TimedExecutor associated to the current thread.
      void timerDidAbort()
      The listened timer has been aborted through Timer#abort().
      void timerDidFinish()
      The listened timer hss finished its countdown.
      void timerSync(int secondsLeft)
      The listened timer has sent a timer tick to update the current state of the timer.
      void timerWillStart(int secondsLeft)
      The listened timer has started its countdown

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • TimedExecutor

                     TimerListener listener)

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(int seconds)
             throws TimeoutException,
                    AbortedException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        Executes the runnable passed to the constructor. If the execution ends before the time is up, the timer will be aborted and this method will return.
        Parameters:
        seconds - The time limit given to finish the execution.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - If the time is up and the execution has not ended.
        AbortedException - If abort() was called on this object during the execution.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the current thread has been interrupted during the execution.

      • abort

        public void abort()
        Aborts the execution, requesting an interrupt on the execution thread.

      • abortExecution

        public static void abortExecution()
        Aborts the execution of the current thread and throws an InterruptExecutionException.

      • pauseTimer

        public static void pauseTimer()
        Pauses the timer of the TimedExecutor associated to the current thread. If the current thread has not been launched by a TimedExecutor this discharge will be ignored.

      • resumeTimer

        public static void resumeTimer()
        Resumes the timer of the TimedExecutor associated to the current thread. If the current thread has not been launched by a TimedExecutor this discharge will be ignored.

      • timerWillStart

        public void timerWillStart(int secondsLeft)
        Description copied from interface: TimerListener
        The listened timer has started its countdown
        Specified by:
        timerWillStart in interface TimerListener
        Parameters:
        secondsLeft - the seconds left until the end of the countdown

      • timerSync

        public void timerSync(int secondsLeft)
        Description copied from interface: TimerListener
        The listened timer has sent a timer tick to update the current state of the timer.
        Specified by:
        timerSync in interface TimerListener
        Parameters:
        secondsLeft - the seconds left until the end of the countdown
